Topic.Title: Bill Clinton Would Have Had a Deal By Now

Message.Msg: Clinton was able to get concessions, but he also bargained in good faith. The GOP trusted him and offered concessions in return that led to progress. Obama is ultra-left and unwilling to compromise... in fact, he's proposing MORE spending when he should be offering spending cuts to counter the GOP's offer to raise $800 billion in taxes on the rich. There's NO QUESTION that the GOP would sign off on $1.4 trillion in added taxes on the rich if Obama would correspondingly offer more spending cuts... ... but he's newly elected and never has to face the voters again so he's gone fringe-left and won't compromise on ANYTHING. Even in 2011... no deal... just a fiscal cliff... and a Senate that hasn't passed a budget in years. Clinton balanced the budget... Obama has virtually stopped government COMPLETELY. Without question... Obama and George W Bush are the absolute WORST 16 years of leadership in american history... ... without question. S

Topic.Title: Bill Clinton Would Have Had a Deal By Now

Message.Msg: You can argue all you want about how 70 years of creating entitlements and the world's most generous "safety net" got us INTO this mess but that's all in the past... ... we are where we are today and we can't change the past. So, given where we are now, nothing is HAPPENING... there is no leadership, either right now or in 2011 when things first broke down and the "fiscal cliff" was created to kick the can down the road. It's good that the GOP came out of the election offering Obama what Obama wanted in 2011... $800 billion in new taxes on the wealthy... and that's on the table right now... ... but Obama Refuses to offer any spending cuts... in fact, he demanded $400 billion in NEW spending for crying out loud. If obama would simply move from the "far left" to the "left"... then he could probably get something done... but he simply has no leadership skills... he can't work with anybody with his "my way or the highway" attitude. It's snobbish, and it's elitist, and it's NOTHING like folksy Bill Clinton and his ability to work with all who are involved. Bill Clinton accomplished great things... Obama has accomplished NOTHING except for ramming a huge new entitlement down america's throat without a single republican vote. Obama's record speaks for itself... no deal this year or last, huge deficits, and a Senate that hasn't passed a budget it several years...... .... the Obama America is stalled and broken. S

Topic.Title: Sociopaths Running Amok While The PC Left Ivy League Run System Avoids Real Action!

Message.Msg: I would love to be locked in a room with one of these fruitcakes that hurts little kids with a baseball bat. Christ said they should have a millstone tied around their neck and be thrown in the sea. I would do the same with those that want to spare their lives.

My Medicare supplement will go up 40% Jan. 1st. Thanks to "Obamacare." The bill was written by the insureance companies and not a single one of the dolts that voted it in read it. My medical bills have skyrocketed since all the insureance was brought in and I get no better care now than 50 years ago. The Kenyan plays a game of duplicity. While castigating business and those that run it he actually is fixing it for them to extort even more from working Americans.
